alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Clark; Fairfield; Franklin; Licking; Madison; Pickaway; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 23 at 6:09AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, FRANKLIN, NORTHWESTERN FAIRFIELD AND NORTH CENTRAL PICKAWAY COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHEASTERN CLARK COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, SOUTHWESTERN LICKING, NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHEASTERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 645 AM EDT... At 608 AM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles west of Plain City to near Mechanicsburg to 8 miles northwest of Choctaw Lake, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 35 mph, half inch hail, and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Dublin, Reynoldsburg, Grove City, Upper Arlington, Gahanna, Hilliard, Pickerington, Worthington, Bexley, Jefferson, Pataskala, Canal Winchester, Groveport, Plain City, West Jefferson, Ashville, Hebron, South Bloomfield and Mechanicsburg. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 74 and 126. I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 91 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Clark; Fairfield; Franklin; Licking; Madison; Pickaway; Union
